document_data.name: ''Quick-loading''
document_data.mainbody: '''Quick-loading''' was a [[weapon quality|quality]] that could be applied to [[crossbow]]s. It creates a space in another dimension from which the wielder could quickly draw and reload [[bolt]]s. Thus, the crossbow wielder did not have to spend time in actual combat readying and loading their weapon.
document_data.Creation: The spells ''[[shrink item]]'' and ''[[Leomund's secret chest]]'' were used when imbuing crossbows with this magical quality.
